context: <user>  Hello, could you help me search for a salon in the SFO area please? <system>  Sure, there are 10 salons you might like in the San Francisco area, one of which is called 1512 Barber Shop. <user>  May I know what is their average rating? <system>  Their average rating is 4.8. <user>  Wow, that sounds good! <system>  Would you like me to schedule an appointment with the salon? <user>  Sure, please schedule one at 3:30 pm please. <system>  Sure, and when will you be visiting the salon?<user>  I will visit them on the Thursday next week. <system>  Please confirm your appointment with 1512 Barber Shop at 3:30 pm on March 7th.<user>  Sure, that sounds fine with me. <system>  Your appointment has been made.<user>  Thank you, could you help me search for restaurants which serves up delicious Lobster in that area too? <system>  Would you like Akiko's Sushi Bar which is located in San Francisco?<user>  May I know what is the price range of their food and if they do serve alcohol? <system>  The restaurant serves alcohol and their food is in the expensive price range.<user>  Are there any alternatives? Would prefer on which is moderate priced. <system>  Sure, there are 10 restaurants in the San Francisco area, one of which is Alamo Square Seafood Grill.<user>  I see, could you make a reservation for three people there at quarter past 1 in the afternoon? <system>  Sure, please confirm your reservation at Alamo Square Seafood Grill in San Francisco for 3 at 1:15 pm on March 7th.<user>  Sure, how can I contact them and do they serve liquor? <system>  Your reservation has been made and you can contact them at 415-440-2828. Unfortunately, they do not serve alcohol.<user>  I see, thank you for your help! <system>  Do you require further assistance?<user>  No, that is all I need, thank you! <system>
